mapper.select:
SELECT ti.id, ti.name, ti.id_card_no, ti.sex, ti.phone, ti.age_type, bti.car_id, bi.car_no FROM trip_info ti left join order_item oi on oi.trip_id = ti.id and oi.is_deleted = 0 left join order_info o on oi.order_id = o.id and o.is_deleted = 0 and o.order_status = 1 left join bus_tour_info bti on ti.id = bti.tour_id and bti.is_deleted = 0 and bti.batch_id = #{batchId} left join bus_info bi on bti.car_id = bi.id
AND ti.name like concat('%', #{touristName}, '%')
AND o.batch_id = #{batchId}
order by ti.id desc

select ti.id as tour_id, bti.car_id as car_id, bi.car_no as car_no from bus_tour_info bti left join trip_info ti on ti.id = bti.tour_id left join bus_info bi on bi.id = bti.car_id
AND bti.batch_id = #{batchId}
and bti.is_deleted = 0
order by ti.id desc
mapper.insert: insert into bus_tour_guide_info(id, batch_id, tour_guide_id, car_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{id}, #{batchId}, #{touristId}, #{carId}, now(), now(), 0)
insert into bus_tour_info(id, batch_id, tour_id, car_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{id}, #{batchId}, #{tourId}, #{carId}, now(), now(), 0)
